title.en: Cinque Terre Weather & Best Time to Visit 2025
Cinque Terre Weather 2025 | Best Time to Visit & Climate Guide

description.en: Complete weather guide for Cinque Terre. Monthly climate, best seasons, what to pack, and tips for planning your perfect visit year-round.

title.it: Meteo e Quando Visitare le Cinque Terre

subtitle.en: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and warm summers. Plan your perfect trip with detailed weather information and seasonal tips
subtitle.it: Clima mediterraneo mite tutto l'anno. Stagioni diverse offrono esperienze uniche: primavera fiorita, estate balneare, autunno vendemmiale, inverno autentico.

description.en: Ideal weather, wildflowers blooming, fewer crowds, perfect hiking conditions, temperatures 15-22°C
description.it: Ideale per trekking. Temperature 15-22°C, fioritura, poca folla. Possibili piogge ad aprile. La stagione perfetta.

description.en: Peak season, hot and busy, perfect beach weather, festivals and events, temperatures 25-30°C
description.it: Alta stagione. 25-30°C, mare caldo, spiagge, eventi. Molto affollato e caro. Caldo intenso sui sentieri.

description.en: Best time to visit, warm sea, wine harvest, fewer tourists, pleasant hiking, temperatures 18-25°C
description.it: Eccellente per visite. 18-25°C in settembre, vendemmia, colori caldi. Meno turisti. Piogge in novembre.

description.en: Quiet season, mild climate, lower prices, some businesses closed, good for authentic experience, 8-15°C
description.it: Bassa stagione. 8-15°C, molti servizi chiusi, poca folla. Autentico ma limitato. Presepe di Manarola a dicembre.

description.en: Wettest months are October-November and March-April. Summer is typically dry with occasional storms
Comfortable walking shoes, sun protection, layers for evening, light jacket for spring/fall
Check transport options, accommodation, and things to do in every season
